characterDescription: The timid ardent came with Azure to the frontlines of the conflict and hurriedly painted glyphwards for the soldiers in Kholinar. He jumped as then King Elhokar took him by the shoulder and shoved an object into his hand. When the ardent asked what it was , Elhokar told him that it was a spanreed, telling him that a half hour after his army marches, the ardent was to contact Urithiru and warn them to get their forces ready to transfer to Kholinar, via the Oathgate. When the ardent tells the king that he can't use a fabrial because of the screamers, Elhokar tells him that the enemy may be too preoccupied by their attack to notice him. But even if they do, he must take the risk. That their armies must be ready. That the fate of the city could depend upon it. To this the ardent nods, pale.
